member_organisations: RAI has 700 members, which are listed in the following pdf: https://raivereniging.nl/ecm/?id=workspace://SpacesStore/f5c01a3b-eeb5-410b-a4ad-8dcc257307ee;2.0
fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Taxation, Research and innovation, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives:
- Decarbonisation strategy 2050 
- Regulations and Directives concerning Airquality (Euro6/VI) and CO2 of mobility and transport 
- WLTP/RDE 
- New CO2 regulation for HDV and busses 
- WVTA directive 
- GSR directive 
- HIT/TENT Hydrogen
organisation_name: Nederlandse Vereniging Rijwiel en Automobiel Industrie (RAI)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
RAI Vereniging behartigt de belangen van 700 fabrikanten en importeurs van personenauto’s en vrachtauto's, aanhangwagens en opleggers, carrosserieën en speciale voertuigen, motorfietsen en scooters, brom- en snorfietsen en fietsen.  
Ook de leveranciers van onderdelen en van garage-uitrusting zijn bij RAI Vereniging aangesloten.
industry_forums: DG CLIMA, Bus and Coach Board meetings and HDV meetings for new CO2 regualation.
